rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious hallway aligning with the Vastu principle of a positive entrance. It leads to the living spaces and provides ample natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan Mediterranean styled space featuring stone accents and large windows for plenty of sunlight as per Vastu guidelines for energy flow. Connects to the dining area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining setup complementing the living room, offering a Mediterranean ambience and seamless integration with adjacent kitchen space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed for efficiency. Features are in line with local building norms and include proper ventilation per Vastu principles (south-west direction).

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite incorporating natural elements of Mediterranean design. Adheres to privacy norms and Vastu considerations for a restful space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to ensure adequate light and ventilation in accordance with local guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom ensuring balanced space allocation while following the Vastu guidelines for personal growth and positivity.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom arranged to maintain harmony with the overall layout and local residential norms.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1 (Master)
rooms.description: Modern en-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom. Features proper plumbing as per Indian building codes.

rooms.name: Bathroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bathroom designed for shared use, ensuring adherence to building norms and sufficient ventilation.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym space integrated within the duplex, offering dedicated area for fitness with consideration of noise insulation per local building standards.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Outdoor balcony serving as transitional space between indoor and outdoor areas. Aligns with Vastu principles by providing natural ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring a positive flow of energy as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Window Alcoves
openings.description: Multiple windows designed to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy in accordance with local residential norms.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Access point leading to the rooftop terrace. Provides a transition space and complies with Vastu recommendations for energy distribution.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom (Duplex)
rooms.description: Extra bedroom in the upper duplex area designed for optimal use of space and maintaining balance as per local design guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Observation Room
rooms.description: A quiet study room designed to offer a peaceful environment, respecting Vastu principles for concentration and clarity.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Main staircase connecting both floors with adequate lighting and open design in line with Vastu.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Secondary access point to the rooftop terrace designed for efficient circulation as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace offering panoramic views and relaxation space. Designed with Mediterranean elements and Vastu principles for balance.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door providing access from the house to the rooftop terrace, ensuring a seamless transition in design and energy flow.
